item.title: Displaying Math in RSS feeds
item.author: grixor@gmail.com (Trang Le)
item.description: The equations in this blog are rendered using [MathJax](http://www.mathjax.org), which creates beautiful math from $\LaTeX$-style markup. However, the math doesn't appear in RSS feeds, because RSS doesn't allow Javascript. While I have a total of 12 RSS followers, this is how my closest collaborators, and my most math-y readers, are likely to read my posts, so I've been looking for a way to produce readable equations in the RSS feed.
